edu.ucla.sspace.basis

Interface BasisMapping<T,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of feature being mapped to a dimension.
    E - the type of object to be used as a description of each dimension.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DependencyPathBasisMapping
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBasisMapping, PathBasedBasisMapping, RelationBasedBasisMapping, RelationPathBasisMapping, StringBasisMapping, WordBasedBasisMapping, WordBasisMapping, WordOrderBasisMapping

    public interface BasisMapping<T,E>
    An interface for specifying how a set of features can be mapped to a vector basis. In the naive case, each feature is mapped it its own dimension. However, many approaches may use information about the feature to represent several different features using a single dimension. For example, each word may correspond to a unique dimension regardless of how it is grammatically related.

    This interface also provides support for describing dimensions. The named of the description is left open to the implementation. For example, an implementation may chose to return a String with a human-readable description. Another implementation may return a Set of features that are represented by the dimension in order to facilitate further processing.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDimension(T features)
      Returns the dimension number corresponding to the provided feature.
      E getDimensionDescription(int dimension)
      Returns a description of the specified dimension.
      boolean isReadOnly()
      Returns true if the BasisMapping is read only, false otherwise.
      Set<E> keySet()
      Returns the set of keys known by this BasisMapping
      int numDimensions()
      Returns the number of dimensions currently represented in this basis mapping.
      void setReadOnly(boolean readOnly)
      Sets the read only state of the basis mapping.

    • Method Detail

      • getDimension

        int getDimension(T features)
        Returns the dimension number corresponding to the provided feature.
        Parameters:
        feature - a feature whose value can be used
        Returns:
        the dimension for the occurrence of the last word in the path

      • getDimensionDescription

        E getDimensionDescription(int dimension)
        Returns a description of the specified dimension.
        Parameters:
        dimension - a dimension number
        Returns:
        a description of the dimension

      • keySet

        Set<E> keySet()
        Returns the set of keys known by this BasisMapping

      • numDimensions

        int numDimensions()
        Returns the number of dimensions currently represented in this basis mapping.

      • setReadOnly

        void setReadOnly(boolean readOnly)
        Sets the read only state of the basis mapping. This is intended for when the basis mapping is needed to map to a known set of values, and any unknown values are left unmapped.

      • isReadOnly

        boolean isReadOnly()
        Returns true if the BasisMapping is read only, false otherwise.
